title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-1.31 - Approval of materials and devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-1.31 - Approval of materials and devices

State Regulations

Application may be made to the board for the approval of
any device, apparatus, material, equipment or method which may be used in
compliance with the intent of this Part (rule) and approval by the board shall
be deemed to authorize such use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-1.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
